documentation.text:
registers and creates stakes for new stakeholders
 deducts the registration tax and staking tax
 calculates refferal bonus from the registration tax and sends it to the _referrer if there is one
 transfers EDCOIN from sender's address into the smart contract
 Emits an {OnRegisterAndStake} event..

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount is below minimum stake value."

arguments.value: Amount is below minimum stake value.

documentation.text:
creates stakes for already registered stakeholders
 deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted
 registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender
 records the previous earnings before updated stakes 
 Emits an {OnStake} event

removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders
 deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount'
 transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards, referral rewards, and current eanrings to the sender 
 deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed
 Emits an {OnStake} event

documentation.text:
creates stakes for already registered stakeholders
 deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted
 registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender
 records the previous earnings before updated stakes 
 Emits an {OnStake} event

removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders
 deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount'
 transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards, referral rewards, and current eanrings to the sender 
 deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed
 Emits an {OnStake} event

registerAndStake(uint256,address).notice: registers and creates stakes for new stakeholders deducts the registration tax and staking tax calculates refferal bonus from the registration tax and sends it to the _referrer if there is one transfers EDCOIN from sender's address into the smart contract Emits an {OnRegisterAndStake} event..

stake(uint256).notice: creates stakes for already registered stakeholders deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender records the previous earnings before updated stakes  Emits an {OnStake} event

unstake(uint256).notice: removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount' transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards, referral rewards, and current eanrings to the sender  deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed Emits an {OnStake} event
